propDescriptions.activeStep: Set the active step (zero based index). Defines which dot is highlighted when the variant is 'dots'.
propDescriptions.backButton: A back button element. For instance, it can be a Button or an IconButton.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.nextButton: A next button element. For instance, it can be a Button or an IconButton.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

positionBottom.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

positionTop.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

positionStatic.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

dots.description: Styles applied to the dots container if {{conditions}}.

dot.description: Styles applied to each dot if {{conditions}}.

dotActive.description: Styles applied to a dot if {{conditions}}.
dotActive.conditions: variant="dots" and this is the active step

progress.description: Styles applied to the Linear Progress component if {{conditions}}.
